home.aboutDescription: Madar is a conversation platform and community initiative exploring how digital design shapes trust, identity, and experience. We bring together designers, creatives, governments, institutions, and conferences to advance the emerging discipline of design language — starting from Riyadh and reaching globally.
home.conversationDescription: Madar is not a consultancy. It is a conversation partner — a platform where ideas about design, governance, culture, and technology meet. We facilitate dialogue between those who shape digital experiences and those who live them. Whether you are a designer seeking deeper purpose, an institution rethinking its digital presence, or a creative exploring new frontiers — Madar is your space to think, exchange, and build together.
home.audience1Desc: Seeking to connect design practice with larger cultural and institutional purpose.
home.audience2Desc: Building digital services that reflect values, trust, and cultural authenticity.
home.audience3Desc: Rethinking how they present themselves and communicate through digital channels.
home.audience4Desc: Looking to explore the intersection of design, culture, and technology.
home.eventsDescription: We convene designers, leaders, institutions, and creatives to explore how digital design can reflect values at civilizational scale.
home.resourcesDescription: Our published white paper on the Digital Design Language of Riyadh.
home.insightsDescription: Perspectives on digital design, cultural identity, and the future of how we experience institutions.
home.principle1Desc: Interfaces should project competence and care, not bureaucratic power.
home.principle2Desc: A system that is fast but unclear is not serving anyone. Comprehension must precede speed.
home.principle3Desc: Digital experiences should welcome, guide, and reassure — as a host would treat a guest.
home.principle4Desc: Design must begin in Arabic and feel native, while remaining accessible to a global audience.
home.joinDescription: Be part of the conversation shaping the future of design language. Designers, creatives, institutions, and thinkers — your voice matters.
home.joinSuccessMessage: Thank you for joining our community. We will be in touch soon.

about.title: About Madar
about.subtitle: A conversation platform shaping the future of digital design language.
about.missionText: Madar exists to advance the emerging discipline of design language — the deliberate, values-driven approach to how we communicate through digital interfaces. We believe design is not an implementation detail; it is the place where trust, identity, and experience are shaped.
about.approachText: We operate at the intersection of design, culture, and technology. Through research, roundtables, and community dialogue, we bring together designers, creatives, governments, institutions, and conferences to build digital experiences that reflect authentic values — starting from Riyadh and reaching globally.
about.focus1Desc: Treating design systems as critical infrastructure, not aesthetic choices.
about.focus2Desc: Building digital experiences that cultivate and maintain trust.
about.focus3Desc: Ensuring digital experiences reflect the cultural context they serve.
about.focus4Desc: Placing people at the center of all digital design decisions.
about.kingdomText: Saudi Arabia is undergoing deliberate, intentional transformation while drawing from deep cultural and historical roots. Madar believes this makes Riyadh the ideal starting point for a global conversation about design language — where tradition meets innovation, and where design becomes a tool of direction, not correction.
